summary: THE REAR WINDOW ON MY 1997 FORD ESCORT SHATTERED WHILE THE CAR WAS UNDER THE CARPORT.  THE WINDOW EXPLODED FROM THE INSIDE.  THE INCIDENT HAPPENED AT APPROXIMATELY 7:30 P.M. CDT.  THERE WAS NO PRIOR STRUCTURAL DAMAGE TO THE WINDOW.  THERE WAS NO VANDALISM INVOLVED, MONROE POLICE DEPT. WAS CALLED AND THEY FOUND NO EVIDENCE OF A CRIMINAL ACT.  ON OBSERVING THE WINDOW, THE OFFICERS COMMENTED THAT THE WINDOW SHATTERED FROM THE INSIDE.  THERE SEEMS TO HAVE BEEN A STRUCTURAL DEFECT IN THE WINDOW.  *NLM
